'''1.21.94''' is a hotfix for ''[[Bedrock Edition]]'' released on July 14, 2025<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/37810171798029-Minecraft-1-21-93-94-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.93/94 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=July 14, 2025}}</ref>, which fixes a bug.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.94|otherissuescount=1}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed an issue that caused entities in some Marketplace packs to revert to their vanilla behaviors.
